help-file.title: "SONG OF CHAOS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous Type of song: Generic
"Song of chaos" is sung in a very chaotic fashion, causing those not in the bard's group to become confused and distracted. This can cause a number of things to happen, such as forcing those not in the bard's group out of the room in various ways. A small amount of damage is also bestowed upon those not grouped.
